dataset_id: BOREAS AFM-08 ECMWF Hourly Surface and Upper Air Data for the SSA and NSA
title: BOREAS AFM-08 ECMWF Hourly Surface and Upper Air Data for the SSA and NSA
summary: Hourly data from the ECMWF operational model from below the surface to the top of the atmosphere, including the model fluxes at the surface, at Candle Lake, Saskatchewan, in the SSA and Thompson, Manitoba, in the NSA 13-May-1994 to 30-Sept-1994 and 01-Mar-1996 to 31-Mar-1997.

cmr.title: BOREAS AFM-08 ECMWF Hourly Surface and Upper Air Data for the SSA and NSA
cmr.summary: Hourly data from the ECMWF operational model from below the surface to the top of the atmosphere, including the model fluxes at the surface, at Candle Lake, Saskatchewan, in the SSA and Thompson, Manitoba, in the NSA 13-May-1994 to 30-Sept-1994 and 01-Mar-1996 to 31-Mar-1997.
cmr.description: Hourly data from the ECMWF operational model from below the surface to the top of the atmosphere, including the model fluxes at the surface, at Candle Lake, Saskatchewan, in the SSA and Thompson, Manitoba, in the NSA 13-May-1994 to 30-Sept-1994 and 01-Mar-1996 to 31-Mar-1997.

citation: Dong, J. and W. Ni-Meister. 2011. Analysis of diurnal boundary layer development in boreal forests: measurements and simulations. Journal of Plant Ecology. 5(2):191-205.
